title: What are talents and skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Talents are your innate abilities and “flare” for doing certain things/tasks. Skills are abilities you acquire by training/learning and practice. For example, as a non-native English speaker, you may have a facility (talent) for using languages which predisposes you to learn easily. However, your language skills are the ability to speak English acquired due to schooling or interaction with English speakers. Usually your talents need polishing by training to become usable skills.

“Talents” are abilities we’re more or less naturally endowed with, like a strong physique, good fine motor skills, a good ear for pitch or a sensitive eye for color discrimination. Talent can be a good memory, or a strong sense of balance, or the ability to “read” people’s faces. “Skills” are the things you learn to make use of your talents. Your good eye for color may lead you to learn to paint; fine motor skills may help you to play a musical instrument, etc.
